text: Ke ma allahala'i chodera aru kasaila'i n'yaya garnako lagi khojum jaba ki usale purna vistarakosatha e'uta kitaba timro lagi patha'eko cha? Yasaka sirsakaharu spastasanga varnana gari'eka chan. Ra jasala'i hamile (pahile) kitaba pradana garyaum tiniharule jandachan ki tyo satya kitaba timro palanakartako tarphabata utari'eko ho, tasartha tapa'i sanka garnemadhyeko nahunu
